name: Cynthia Lokker
title: Associate Professor, Health Research Methods, Evidence, and Impact
overview: Dr. Cynthia Lokker is a health research methodologist and researcher in the Health Information  Research Unit, Department of Health Research Methods, Evidence, and Impact at McMaster University. Her research focuses on leveraging information retrieval and summarization approaches, particularly machine learning and natural language processing, to support evidence-based medicine and knowledge translation. She has expertise in digital health and evaluating mobile health applications.
